ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: those who do not associate anything with their Lord,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Who do not associate any one with their Lord,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: who associate none with their Lord in His Divinity,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: who consider nothing equal to their Lord,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And those who do not ascribe any partner to their Lord –
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And those who join not anyone as partners with their Lord;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And those who do not associate (aught) with their Lord,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and those who associate naught with their Lord
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And those who ascribe not partners unto their Lord,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and do not ascribe partners to Him;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And those who with their Lord associate not anyone.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and do not ascribe partners to their Lord;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Those who join not (in worship) partners with their Lord;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And those who join not anyone (in worship) as partners with their Lord;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: who associate none with their Lord,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And those who associate no partners with their Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And they who do not associate anything with their Lord
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [23:59] and who do not associate others with their Lord,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And those who ascribe not partners) idols (unto their Lord) for these We hasten with good things;
